description:
Looking for Baby massage techniques to help your baby and child managing health issue? Look not further! Your own two hands and the loving touch are just the tools you need to help your little one to gain better health and built strong bonds between you!

In a comprehensive 2 hours lesson you will

  • learn the technique to improve the immunity of the baby and child
  • help to improve his or her appetite
  • manage and relieve his or her stomach-ache, Night Sweating, Constipation, Sinusitis.

TCM Pediatric Massage is gentle and safe and with no side effect. Consistent use of the Massage techniques besides preventing the occurrence of diseases, it helps to treat Pediatric Disorders.

This course is designed for all who care enough for our little one to commit the time to learn this ancient art of healing touch, to take ownership of the health and well-being, and to have the opportunity build a stronger bond with our little one.

Looking forward to seeing you in the student area.

Merry Christmas and Happy New Year!
title: Baby Massage - Effective TCM Baby & Child Massage techniques
